attributes.action: Revoke the shoot to kill policy and reasonable force should only be used where there is a clear and present threat to human life, which was missing in the case of the foreign National, a Brazilian.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bring justice for the family of an innocent foreign National, a Brazilian and ensure that those responsible for his unlawful death are brought to account. In addition, the "shoot to kill" policy should be revoked and reasonable force should only be used where there is a clear and present threat to human life, which was missing in this case.An innocent foreign National, a Brazilian, was shot by police seven times in the head and once in the shoulder, whist he was going about his legal and peaceful business.
Police used unreasonable force, over and above that which was required, in the situation.
Police should apply reasonable force in situations where a life or the lives of themselves or others are at risk.  This was not present in the case of the innocent foreign National, a Brazilian.
